package.description:
race_move_arms unifies and replaces the existing actions for arm movement:
tuck_arms (leftposture rightposture) carryarm (carrypose carryarm) move_arm_to_side (arm) (from PickAndPlaceManager)
It should take two arguments: the goal postures for each arm. The following ArmPostures should be applicable:
ArmToSidePosture ArmTuckedPosture ArmUntuckedPosture ArmCarryPosture
As in the tuck_arms action, the action should achieve these goal postures independently of the initial postures of the arms.
package.author: Sebastian Rockel
